data.comment: A total of 5723 spectators is reported.
The big names in today's match at VTB Arena have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Moscow.
In the minute 1, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Ivan Ordets (Dinamo Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Charles Kabore gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 8, Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow advance rapidly upfield but Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin blows for offside.
In the minute 10, Dinamo Moscow attack but Sebastian Szymanski's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 12, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Parshivlyuk of Dinamo Moscow is pulled up for offside.
Clinton N'Jie for Dinamo Moscow is whistled offside.
In the minute 15, Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 18, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Play has been interrupted briefly in Moscow to check on Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, who is grimacing with pain.
Rubin Kazan’s Khvicha Kvaratskhelia is on his feet again at VTB Arena.
Dinamo Moscow push forward at VTB Arena and Clinton N'Jie gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rubin Kazan defence.
In the minute 24, Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Roman Evgeniev fires in a strike for Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Clinton N'Jie for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Dinamo Moscow's Sergey Parshivlyuk is whistled for offside at VTB Arena.
In the minute 28, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Moscow Dinamo Moscow attack through Clinton N'Jie. The finish is off target, however.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Rubin Kazan have been given a penalty at VTB Arena...
Hwang In-beom is booked for the away team.
Goal! Djordje Despotovic gives Rubin Kazan the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 0-1.
In the minute 33, Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dinamo Moscow defender.
Dinamo Moscow pushes forward through Sebastian Szymanski, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 34, Rubin Kazan are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sergey Parshivlyuk (Dinamo Moscow) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
Attention is being given to Rubin Kazan’s Khvicha Kvaratskhelia and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 36, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia returns to the field for Rubin Kazan after picking up a slight injury.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 38, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow's Maximilian Philipp gets in a shot on goal at VTB Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Denis Makarov for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at VTB Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 43, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Soltmurad Bakaev is the substitute for Rubin Kazan.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Moscow.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 47, Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko has been booked in Moscow.
In Moscow, Daniil Fomin of Dinamo Moscow is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 49, Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Maximilian Philipp fires in a strike for Dinamo Moscow.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 52, Dinamo Moscow's Nikolay Komlichenko has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Maximilian Philipp (Dinamo Moscow) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 55, Can Dinamo Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie has run offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin waits before resuming play because Charles Kabore for Dinamo Moscow is still down.
In the minute 58, Charles Kabore (Dinamo Moscow) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Nikola Moro.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 62, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 64, Dinamo Moscow's Dmitri Skopintsev breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Hwang In-beom for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Dinamo Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 67, Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Sylvester Igboun replacing Maximilian Philipp.
In the minute 72, Rubin Kazan push forward at VTB Arena and Hwang In-beom gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dinamo Moscow defence.
The match at VTB Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ivan Ordets, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 74, Ivan Ordets for Dinamo Moscow is back on the field again.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 76, Oleg Shatov (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In Moscow Rubin Kazan drive forward through Denis Makarov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 78, Rubin Kazan's Oleg Shatov is on target but unsuccessful.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov breaks free at VTB Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at VTB Arena.
In the minute 80, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan are pushing forward but Soltmurad Bakaev's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 84, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow just outside Rubin Kazan's area.
The home team replace Daniil Fomin with Igor Shkolik.
Kirill Novikov is making the team's fourth substitution at VTB Arena with Vyacheslav Grulev replacing Clinton N'Jie.
In the minute 86, Sebastian Szymanski of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 87, In Moscow a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Dinamo Moscow in Moscow.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moscow.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Sylvester Igboun (Dinamo Moscow) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Rubin Kazan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dinamo Moscow.
Denis Makarov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
The away team have replaced Oleg Shatov with Darko Jevtic. This is the second substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
At VTB Arena, Mikhail Merkulov has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Hwang In-beom has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
He's off! Sergey Parshivlyuk is shown a second yellow card.
